title: Add Player Count to match found
body:
Can Riot add back the player count back when match is found, because it is hard to tell if people have accept the match or not.
Possibly inside this red box:
http://i.imgur.com/gVNUFYV.png

replies.body: Why on earth would you want that back? Knowing how many players have accepted is not useful at all, that's probably why they haven't added it. The only thing that matters is whether everyone accepted or not. There's literally no point, other than trying to convince yourself that not everyone will accept, then what? It's not like you can do anything with this information.
I believe this is a great idea and should be considered. But is only optional because it is not a major thing

There isn't a player count for ranked que. In my opinion I don't think it is needed. If you get into game it means everyone clicked accept, if they didn't you see a notification saying someone didn't accept.
